title: SHOW VERSIONS IN MODEL command: New column aliases | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_04 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

When this behavior change bundle is enabled, the output of the SHOW VERSIONS IN MODEL command
changes to include a new column named aliases.
Aliases of the model version, if any. If a model version has no aliases, this column contains an empty ARRAY ([]) rather than NULL.
aliases is added as the third column of the output, immediately following name.
